data.title: News and communications
data.meta_description: Find news and communications from government
data.text:
A new expert group will speed up delivery of stalled housing sites, supporting plans to boost economic growth and deliver 1.5 million homes.

Updated: 29 August 2024

Statement by Ambassador James Kariuki, UK Deputy Permanent Representative to the UN, at the UN Security Council meeting on Russian attacks on Ukrainian civilians and civilian infrastructure.

Updated: 28 August 2024

The King has approved the following new appointments to His Majesty's Most Honourable Privy Council.

Updated: 28 August 2024

Rosewood Pet Products has made a financial contribution of Â£66,149.57 to a local charity after failing to comply with packaging waste regulations.

Updated: 28 August 2024

Minister Morgan's speech made at the Global Education and Innovation Summit in the Republic of Korea

Updated: 28 August 2024

UK Statement for Universal Periodic Review Adoption of the Republic of Mauritius.

Updated: 28 August 2024

UK Statement for the Interactive Dialogue on High Commissioner's report on technical cooperation in Colombia. Delivered in Geneva on 8 July 2024.

Updated: 28 August 2024

Manchester City Council and the Government Property Agency (GPA) have opened a joint consultation around emerging plans for the former retail site.

Updated: 28 August 2024

British High Commission Accra bids farewell to 17 Chevening Scholarship and 30 Commonwealth Scholarship winners.

Updated: 28 August 2024

Latest information and actions from the Education and Skills Funding Agency for academies, schools, colleges, local authorities and further education providers.

Updated: 28 August 2024

Captain Shakeel ur Rehman MBE, formerly of the Pakistan Army, has been awarded an honorary MBE for Services to UK-Pakistan Relations.

Updated: 28 August 2024

A unique cross-sector collaboration has created an improved approach to the design and build of a key component in the nuclear industry.

Updated: 28 August 2024

Prime Minister Keir Starmer's remarks at his press conference with Chancellor Scholz in Germany.

Updated: 28 August 2024

Ian Murray underlines government mission for growth, with Scotland playing a critical part in rebuilding UK economy

Updated: 28 August 2024

The King has been pleased to appoint Ms Catherine Maxwell Stuart DL as His Lord-Lieutenant for Tweeddale.

Updated: 28 August 2024

Summary of responses and government response to the consultation on revised charges for the National Residues Control Programme.

Updated: 28 August 2024

Fuel poverty has flatlined says the Committee on Fuel Poverty - current policies to reduce fuel poverty have not continued a downward trajectory in fuel poor households.

Updated: 28 August 2024

World-first public-private collaboration launched to kickstart economic growth and build an NHS fit for the future.

Updated: 28 August 2024

Joint declaration between Prime Minister Keir Starmer and Chancellor Scholz on deepening and enhancing UK-Germany relations.

Updated: 28 August 2024
